name: iStable
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
What is iStable?
I-Stable is a fully compromised ecosystem with staking, swap, its own wallet, aswell as stable coin rewards!

What is the mission of iStable?
I-Stable aims to provide all users of its ecosystem a flawless user experience using its customised dashboards.
